gra której fenomenu nie rozumie... od zwykła strzelanka z nawet niezłą historią lecz miernym gameplayem,
ta gra jest po prostu nudna bo ile razy można strzelać po raz 100 do tego samego stworka ? jasne w tej grze są ciekawe rozwiązania jak np heb craby... i to tyle bo reszta to utarty schemat czyli walki z helikopterami, z potworami, ludźmi oraz jeżdżeniem autem. czyli nic ciekawego.

grafika jest po prostu zła i ja wiem że to 2004 rok ale na 2020 jest po prostu tragiczna.

podsumowując ?

ta gra niczym się nie wyróżnia... no może hed crabami bo reszta to kolejna wizja o ratowaniu świata z miernym gameplayem.
é um belo clasico eu recomendo

Um dos melhores jogos já feitos com certeza. O mundo parece ter passado por um apocalipse alienigena, e vc é meio que uma Lenda do passado que aparece do nada e ajuda aqueles que o tem como um salvador messianico.
A diferença é que vc vai resolver tudo na base da bala, morte e destruição. O jogo é um filme de ação e aventura do inicio ao fim. Não espere ser mais do Half Life 1, equi tudo muda, o jogo se reinventa e vai te surpreender.

미안하다 이거 보여주려고 어그로끌었다.. 반시민 콤바인 싸움수준 ㄹㅇ실화냐? 진짜 세계관최강자들의 싸움이다.. 그찐따같던 시민이 맞나? 진짜 고든프리맨은 전설이다..진짜옛날에 맨날하프라이프 스토리 정리봘는데 드디어 콤바인에게 반기를든반시민보면 진짜내가다 감격스럽고 17번지구인트로부터 넥서스박살내는거까지 가슴울리는장면들이 뇌리에 스치면서 가슴이 웅장해진다.. 그리고 챔터 레이븐홈쯤에 좀비한테 당한거 복수할려고 팬티벗고 나와서 샷건들고 덤비는 그레고리 신부 나오는 장면은 진짜 하프라이프처음부터 한사람이면 안울수가없더라 진짜 너무 감격스럽고 알릭스 최근에 알았는데 미안하다.. 지금유튜브보는데 진짜 나이적은 알릭스 나와서 너무 감격스럽고 모두씹좆망17번지구에서 썩어가는거보니 내가 다 뭔가 알수없는 추억이라해야되나 그런감정이 이상하게 얽혀있다.. 알릭스는 키가 많이 큰거같다.. 좋은흑인이고.. 그리고 브린왜욕하냐 귀여운데 ㄹㅇ세상에서 제일병신같은브린이야 그리고 외전작에 시타델에서 꺼드럭거릴때랑 17번지구 방송하는 bj 브린 나온다는게 사실임?? 그리고인터닛에 쳐봣는디 이거 ㄹㅇㄹㅇ 진짜팩트냐?? 그이야기가 17번지구에 나오는 애들 시장임?ㅡ 17번지구 꼬라지봐라 진짜 ㅆㅂ 이거보고 개충격먹어가지고 와 소리 저절로 나오더라 ;; 진짜 저건 개오지는데.. 저게 ㄹㅇ이면 진짜 꼭봐야돼 진짜 세계도 지배하는는거아니야 .. 와 진짜 고든프리맨이 저렇게 되다니 진짜 눈물나려고했다.. 알릭스 계속보는중인데 저거 ㄹㅇ이냐..? 하.. ㅆㅂ 고든프리맨 보고싶다.. 진짜언제 이렇게 좁밥이 되었을까 옛날생각나고 나 초딩때생각나고 뭔가 슬프기도하고 좋기도하고 감격도하고 여러가지감정이 복잡하네.. 아무튼 하프라이프는 진짜 게임중최거명작임...

I generally avoid saying things like “the best” or “the worst game ever,” but I will say this: Half-Life 2 is the game that had the most impact on me as a person. It even steered me towards a career in a the video games industry.

I am not a fan of science fiction works, especially books or movies, but I do enjoy dystopian settings—this might be part of the reason why I enjoyed Half-Life 2 so much. However, it might as well be that I enjoy dystopian settings because of my early acquaintance with Half-Life.

The game is beautifully executed and has aged well. It is one of the first games to integrate the (new, at that time) Havok physics engine, and the first to do it well. The mechanics and puzzles in Half-Life 2 are based around the capabilities of this engine. It doesn't force it upon you such that it becomes a glorified tech demo, but it is integrated in a way that serves the narrative. The physics gun, now a recognizable icon in the video game culture, is a good example of this.

The graphics are noticeably old, but do not ruin the experience in any way. The character models, especially the facial animations, are still unmatched by other, newer AAA games. It is only the environment, such as the terrain, that might look in need of a remake.

In my opinion, Half-Life 2 succeeds accomplished one important goal: integrating multiple settings in a seamless way, such as to make use of both varied mechanics and some core mechanics in different settings. It starts with 1984 style chapter  “Point Insertion,”  which gives way to “A Red Letter Day” and “Route Kanal,” the latter being inspired by the Kanał, a film about a company of Home Army resistance fighters escaping the Nazi through the sewers of Warsaw. “Water Hazard” continues the escape through the City 17 canal system and is centered around vehicle combat. After that, “Black Mesa East” is a story transition chapter to “We Don't Go To Ravenholm...,” a ghost town horror chapter worthy of an actually horror game. Following that, “Highway 17” is, in similar fashion to “Water Hazard,” a chapter based around vehicle combat with the purpose of travelling to “Nova Prospekt.” Before arriving to Nova Prospekt, we have an intermediate chapter called “Sandtraps,” which makes use of a new mechanic—using enemy creatures to kill other enemies. “Nova Prospekt” and “Entanglement” are story-rich chapter taking place in a prison setting, with mainly interior, dark themed, combat. By means of teleportation, these chapters give way to “Anticitizen One” and “Follow Freeman!,” both of which focus on urban combat and entertain themes of resistance against authority, building tension for the next two chapters —“Our Benefactors” and  “Dark Energy,” both being story-rich chapters taking place inside the Citadel, entertaining a new mechanics based on an enhanced gravity gun.

It is hard to say how much of a social and technical impact Half-Life 2 had on the gaming world, but I believe it is one of the most influential games of our generation. I still play it regularly to this day, and probably will for years to come. It's story is inspiring and its technicalities are solid.

With so many new AAA games today, should you play Half-Life 2 today? It doesn't have the graphics or other advantages of new games, but you should look at it as a piece of culture. In the same way that early Star Wars or Terminator movies do not have the special effects of newer science fiction motion pictures, but are important to understanding the context of newer works, so if Half-Life important to understanding the context of newer games. It you are a casual player, it might not be worth your time, but if you consider yourself a “gamer,” it is a must-play.

It was very exciting to play and one point with the sand bugs got a little frustrating because they were popping up so fast and I had to figure out the fastest way to the nest spot where I would be safe. Once I got to the real safe place where a creature, (I forget the guys name) did something to the really big bug and made a little ball thing to control the sand bugs. Once I had control of the sand bugs they were great allies and so helpful getting rid of the combine as I went to place to place and really saved on ammo and other useful devices. I really loved the game but got really  frustrated in a couple of the places but those places really put your brain to work in figuring out what to do to go through that spot to continue. I really loved playing this game!

Игра отличная! В плане сюжета 10/10, но есть минусы. Во первых вся игра сделана на скриптах и открытого мира как такого го нет. Так же нету выбора, (а особенно в конце хотелся бы выбор, стать на сторону сопротевления или Альянса) но в целом не плохо. И хотелось бы цену по меньше, рублей 100-150, а то как дорого на 10-20 часов, если считать выполнение всех ачивок, делать везде остановки в главах с транспортом, а так же не спидранить.

Auch 2020 noch ein tolles Spiel. Die Grafik finde ich auch noch sehr gut. Frühe benötigte es teure Hardware um das Spiel bei hohen Details ruckelfrei spielen zu können. Heute kommt man an Stellen wo es früher ruckelig wurde und es macht Spaß diese Stellen mit maximalen Details spielen zu können.

И так... Игра Half-Life 2. Сама по себе игра очень интересная, много разных достижений, много оружия, разные нпс и множество разных паразитов. Для каждого из паразитов, есть свой способ убийства, что делает игру немного тяжелее, но это и интересно.
Перейдём к графике, по моему мнению графика очень даже хороша для того времени, когда она выпустилась. Свето тени всегда и везде хорошо показаны. 
Сюжет бомба. С самого начала нас заставляют понервничать и побегать в поисках выхода, что очень зацепляет тебя.
Из минусов сюжета, могу отметить конец игры. Не хочу спойлерить, но скажу одно. Игра заканчивается на самом интересном месте, и тебе хочется видеть продолжение, но никак, ведь это конец. И остаётся в душе не большой осадок тоски и печали, ведь ты сидел целыми днями играл, переживал за Доктора Фримена. А тут, раз и все. Конец, а что было дальше?!?! Никто не знает. На моё усмотрение игра очень интересная, динамичная и раз в 100 превосходит свою первую часть.

I have played this game at least eight times previously. My father orignally had it on the original xbox, I played it once but idon't remember it very well. That being said we eventually bought the Orange Box for the 360 and I have put so many hours into that game. As of the time of this review, this is the first time I've played Half-Life 2 and its episodes on PC and it is a blast. 

First of Half-Life 2 and its episodes are already amazing as is. However impulse 101ing my way through the game for the first time was so satisfying being able to kill metro cops before you're supposed to have weapons. It really was a fulfilling experience.

Outside of console commands this game is a must play for anyone who wants to play what is easily one of the best firstperson shooters with a fulfilling story.  Easily a 10/10
